root.title: Mainz 385a-d (TM 337) 408
root.store: Берлиндегі Бранденбург ғылым академиясында (Berlin-Brandenburgischen Akademie der Wissenschaften) сақтаулы.
root.general: 4 fragments are glazed together. a (at the left): left field is 1.9 cm; b (on the right, top): the right part of the manuscript, the letter slightly turned pale, right field is 1.3 cm; c and d: average parts of the manuscript, the last fragment is damaged.
root.description: Manuscript: Old Turkic. Paper: aqueous stains. Quantity of lines: a: 7 lines in each in A and B; b: 3 lines in each in A and B; c: 3 lines in each in A and B; d: 2 lines in each only with one symbol in A and B. Designations: A: a: on a right edge: Т.М. 337 (pencil); c: on the bottom: Т.М.337 (pencil); on the bottom stickers Mainz 385 and TM. 337. Characteristics: Colon marks are outlined in red. In the fragment “b” colon marks are not outlined in red, put down on one red point on the right and on the left of colon marks.
root.size: Distance between lines: a: 1.1 cm; b: 0.8 cm; c: 1.0 cm; d: it is not defined. a: 7.7 cm (height) x 5.1 cm (width); b: 5.4 cm (height) x 3.1 cm (width); c: 2.8 cm (height) x 3.8 cm (width); d: 1.4 cm (height) x 0.8 cm (width).
root.investigation: Sertkaya 424 conducted researches.
root.details: Depositum der BERLIN-BRANDENBURGISCHEN AKADEMIE DER WISSENSCHAFTEN in der STAATSBIBLIOTHEK ZU BERLIN - Preussischer Kulturbesitz. Orientabteilung.
